hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT P.PROCEEDING_ID AS "proceedingId", P.PROCEEDING_NO AS "proceedingNumber", PID.PATENT_NO AS "patentNumber", PID.APPLICATION_ID AS "applicationNumber", PETITIONERPARTY.PETITIONERNAME AS "petitionerName", PATENTOWNERPARTY.PATENTOWNER AS "patentOwnerName", PID.TECH_CENTER_ID AS "techCenter", (SELECT pid1.application_Id FROM Prcdng_Invention_Disclosure pid1, stnd_Prcdng_Party_Group_Type sppgt WHERE sppgt.prcdng_party_group_type_id = pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id AND pid1.fk_proceeding_Id = pid.fk_proceeding_Id AND pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id = 1 ) AS "petitionerAppId", (SELECT pid1.patent_No FROM Prcdng_Invention_Disclosure pid1, stnd_Prcdng_Party_Group_Type sppgt WHERE sppgt.prcdng_party_group_type_id = pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id AND pid1.fk_proceeding_Id = pid.fk_proceeding_Id AND pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id = 1 ) AS "petitionerPatentNo", (SELECT pid1.tech_center_id FROM Prcdng_Invention_Disclosure pid1, stnd_Prcdng_Party_Group_Type sppgt WHERE sppgt.prcdng_party_group_type_id = pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id AND pid1.fk_proceeding_Id = pid.fk_proceeding_Id AND pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id = 1 ) AS "petitionerTechcenter", SFTS.STATE_NM AS "status", M.FILINGDT AS "filingDate", M.ACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "petAccordedFilingDate", POACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "poAccordedFilingDate", M.NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "noticeOfAccordedFilingDate", M.PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT AS "prelimRespDate", M.INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT AS "instDecisionDate", M.PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDUEDT AS "poPrelimRespDueDate", M.INSTITUTIONDECISIONDUEDT AS "instDecisionDueDate", M.FINALDECISIONDUEDT AS "finalWritenDeciDueDate", M.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT AS "terminationDate", M.HEARINGDT AS "hearingDate", M.TRIALCERTIFICATEDT AS "trialCertificateDate", PET_APPEAL_DT AS "petAppNoticeDate", PO_APPEAL_DT AS "poAppNoticeDate", JO_APPEAL_DT AS "jointAppNoticeDate", PET_COURT_DESCN_DT AS "petCourtDecisionDate", PO_COURT_DESCN_DT AS "poCourtDecisionDate", JO_COURT_DESCN_DT AS "jointCourtDecisionDate", PET_REQUEST_DT AS "petRehearReqDate", PO_REQUEST_DT AS "poRehearReqDate", JO_REQUEST_DT AS "jointRehearReqDate", BOARD_REQUEST_DT AS "boardRequestDate", PET_DECSN_DT AS "petRehearDecisionDate", PO_DECSN_DT AS "poRehearDecisionDate", JO_DECSN_DT AS "jointRehearDecisionDate", BOARD_DECSN_DT AS "boardDecisionDate" FROM PROCEEDING P INNER JOIN PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PID.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PID.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 INNER JOIN PROCEEDING_FSM_INSTANCE PFI ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PFI.FK_PROCEEDING_ID INNER JOIN STND_FSM_TYPE_STATE SFTS ON PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID = SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PETITIONERNAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PETITIONERPARTY ON PETITIONERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PATENTOWNER FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PATENTOWNERPARTY ON PATENTOWNERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID AS APJ1EMPLOYEEID FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST PP, APPLICATION_USER AU, STND_PANEL_ROLE SPR WHERE PP.END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND PP.FK_PANELIST_ID = AU.APPLICATION_USER_ID AND PP.FK_PANEL_ROLE_ID = SPR.PANEL_ROLE_ID AND PP.PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID = 1 ) APJ1 ON APJ1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.PROCEEDINGID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 1, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 2, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS ACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 3, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 4, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 5, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 6, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FINALDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 7, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDUEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 8, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS INSTITUTIONDECISIONDUEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 9, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FINALDECISIONDUEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 10, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS TERMINATIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 11, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS HEARINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 12, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS REINSTITUTIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 13, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS TRIALCERTIFICATEDT FROM (SELECT M.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, M.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, M.MILESTONE_DT FROM PROCEEDING_MILESTONE M ) P GROUP BY P.PROCEEDINGID ) M ON M.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, 1, P.APPEAL_NOTICE_DT)) AS PET_APPEAL_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, 2, P.APPEAL_NOTICE_DT)) AS PO_APPEAL_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, 3, P.APPEAL_NOTICE_DT)) AS JO_APPEAL_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, 1, P.COURT_DECISION_DT)) AS PET_COURT_DESCN_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, 2, P.COURT_DECISION_DT)) AS PO_COURT_DESCN_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, 3, P.COURT_DECISION_DT)) AS JO_COURT_DESCN_DT FROM (SELECT pa1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, pa1.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, pa1.APPEAL_NOTICE_DT, pa1.COURT_DECISION_DT FROM (SELECT FK_PROCEEDING_ID, FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID, MAX(CREATE_TS) AS latestCreateTs FROM PROCEEDING_APPEAL GROUP BY FK_PROCEEDING_ID, FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID ) pa INNER JOIN PROCEEDING_APPEAL pa1 ON pa.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = pa1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND pa.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID = pa1.FK_APPEAL_PARTY_TYPE_ID AND pa.latestCreateTs = pa1.CREATE_TS ) P GROUP BY P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID ) APPEAL ON APPEAL.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 1, P.REQUEST_DT)) AS PET_REQUEST_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 2, P.REQUEST_DT)) AS PO_REQUEST_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 3, P.REQUEST_DT)) AS BOARD_REQUEST_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 4, P.REQUEST_DT)) AS JO_REQUEST_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 1, P.DECISION_DT)) AS PET_DECSN_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 2, P.DECISION_DT)) AS PO_DECSN_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 3, P.DECISION_DT)) AS BOARD_DECSN_DT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, 4, P.DECISION_DT)) AS JO_DECSN_DT FROM (SELECT r1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, r1.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, r1.REQUEST_DT, r1.DECISION_DT FROM (SELECT FK_PROCEEDING_ID, FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID, MAX(CREATE_TS) AS latestCreateTs FROM REHEARING GROUP BY FK_PROCEEDING_ID, FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID ) r INNER JOIN REHEARING r1 ON r.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = r1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND r.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID = r1.FK_REQUESTOR_TYPE_ID AND r.latestCreateTs = r1.CREATE_TS ) P GROUP BY P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID ) REHEARING ON REHEARING.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT PPg.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, STATUS_DT AS POACCORDEDFILINGDT FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG WHERE PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID = 1 ) PPG ON PPG.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID WHERE SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID IN (1002, 1003, 1004, 1006, 1008, 1009, 1013, 1014, 1015, 1021, 1023) )A

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT P.PROCEEDING_ID AS "proceedingId", P.PROCEEDING_NO AS "proceedingNumber", (SELECT PID1.PATENT_NO FROM PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID1 WHERE PID1.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 AND PID1.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID AND rownum =1 ) AS "respondentPatentNumber" , (SELECT PID2.PATENT_NO FROM PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID2 WHERE PID2.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 AND PID2.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 1 AND PID2.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID AND rownum =1 ) AS "petitionerPatentNumber", (SELECT PID1.APPLICATION_ID FROM PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID1 WHERE PID1.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 AND PID1.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID AND rownum =1 ) AS "respondentApplicationNumber", (SELECT PID2.APPLICATION_ID FROM PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID2 WHERE PID2.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 AND PID2.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 1 AND PID2.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID AND rownum =1 ) AS "petitionerApplicationNumber", PETITIONERPARTY.PETITIONERNAME AS "petitionerName", PATENTOWNERPARTY.PATENTOWNER AS "patentOwnerName", (SELECT PID1.TECH_CENTER_ID FROM PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID1 WHERE PID1.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 AND PID1.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID AND rownum =1 ) AS "poTechCenter", (SELECT PID2.TECH_CENTER_ID FROM PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID2 WHERE PID2.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 AND PID2.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 1 AND PID2.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID AND rownum =1 ) AS "petitionerTechCenter", M.FILINGDT AS "filingDate", M.ACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "petAccordedFilingDate", M.NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "noticeOfAccordedFilingDate", M.PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT AS "prelimRespDate", M.INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT AS "instDecisionDate", M.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT AS "terminationDate", M.HEARINGDT AS "hearingDate", PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID AS "fsmState", SFTS.STATE_NM AS "status" FROM (SELECT P1.* FROM PROCEEDING P1 WHERE P1.PROCEEDING_ID NOT IN (SELECT P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST P WHERE P.END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL GROUP BY P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID HAVING COUNT(P.FK_PROCEEDING_ID) >= 3 ) ) P INNER JOIN PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PID.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PID.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 INNER JOIN PROCEEDING_FSM_INSTANCE PFI ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PFI.FK_PROCEEDING_ID INNER JOIN STND_FSM_TYPE_STATE SFTS ON PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID = SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PETITIONERNAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PETITIONERPARTY ON PETITIONERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PATENTOWNER FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PATENTOWNERPARTY ON PATENTOWNERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.PROCEEDINGID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 1, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 2, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS ACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 3, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 4, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 5, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 10, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS TERMINATIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 11, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS HEARINGDT FROM (SELECT M.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, M.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, M.MILESTONE_DT FROM PROCEEDING_MILESTONE M ) P GROUP BY P.PROCEEDINGID ) M ON M.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID WHERE SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID IN (1002, 1003, 1004, 1006, 1007, 1008, 1009, 1010, 1013, 1014, 1015, 1019, 1020, 1021, 1023, 1024, 1025) ) A

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT P.PROCEEDING_ID AS "proceedingId", P.PROCEEDING_NO AS "proceedingNumber", PID.PATENT_NO AS "patentNumber", PID.APPLICATION_ID AS "applicationNumber", PETITIONERPARTY.PETITIONERNAME AS "petitionerName", PATENTOWNERPARTY.PATENTOWNER AS "patentOwnerName", PID.TECH_CENTER_ID AS "techCenter", M.FILINGDT AS "filingDate", M.ACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "petAccordedFilingDate", POACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "POACCORDEDFILINGDT", M.NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "noticeOfAccordedFilingDate", M.PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT AS "prelimRespDate", M.INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT AS "instDecisionDate", M.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT AS "terminationDate", M.HEARINGDT AS "hearingDate", P.PRELIMINARY_RESPONSE_FILED_IN AS "prelimRespWaived" FROM PROCEEDING P INNER JOIN PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PID.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PID.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 INNER JOIN PROCEEDING_FSM_INSTANCE PFI ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PFI.FK_PROCEEDING_ID INNER JOIN STND_FSM_TYPE_STATE SFTS ON PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID = SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PETITIONERNAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PETITIONERPARTY ON PETITIONERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PATENTOWNER FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PATENTOWNERPARTY ON PATENTOWNERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID AS APJ1EMPLOYEEID FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST PP, APPLICATION_USER AU, STND_PANEL_ROLE SPR WHERE PP.END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND PP.FK_PANELIST_ID = AU.APPLICATION_USER_ID AND PP.FK_PANEL_ROLE_ID = SPR.PANEL_ROLE_ID AND PP.PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID = 1 ) APJ1 ON APJ1.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.PROCEEDINGID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 1, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 2, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS ACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 3, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 4, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 5, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 10, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS TERMINATIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 11, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS HEARINGDT FROM (SELECT M.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, M.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, M.MILESTONE_DT FROM PROCEEDING_MILESTONE M ) P GROUP BY P.PROCEEDINGID ) M ON M.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT PPg.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, STATUS_DT AS POACCORDEDFILINGDT FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG WHERE PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID = 1 ) PPG ON PPG.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID WHERE SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID IN (1002, 1003, 1004, 1006, 1008, 1009, 1013, 1014, 1015, 1021, 1023) AND P.PRELIMINARY_RESPONSE_FILED_IN IN ('N') ) A

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT P.PROCEEDING_ID AS "proceedingId", P.PROCEEDING_NO AS "proceedingNumber", PID.PATENT_NO AS "pOpatentNumber", PID.APPLICATION_ID AS "respondentApplicationNumber", PETITIONERPARTY.PETITIONERNAME AS "petitionerName", PATENTOWNERPARTY.PATENTOWNER AS "patentOwnerName", PID.TECH_CENTER_ID AS "poTechCenter", (SELECT pid1.application_Id FROM Prcdng_Invention_Disclosure pid1, stnd_Prcdng_Party_Group_Type sppgt WHERE sppgt.prcdng_party_group_type_id = pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id AND pid1.fk_proceeding_Id = pid.fk_proceeding_Id AND pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id = 1 ) AS "petitionerApplicationNumber", (SELECT pid1.patent_No FROM Prcdng_Invention_Disclosure pid1, stnd_Prcdng_Party_Group_Type sppgt WHERE sppgt.prcdng_party_group_type_id = pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id AND pid1.fk_proceeding_Id = pid.fk_proceeding_Id AND pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id = 1 ) AS "petitionerPatentNumber", (SELECT pid1.tech_center_id FROM Prcdng_Invention_Disclosure pid1, stnd_Prcdng_Party_Group_Type sppgt WHERE sppgt.prcdng_party_group_type_id = pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id AND pid1.fk_proceeding_Id = pid.fk_proceeding_Id AND pid1.fk_prcdng_party_group_type_id = 1 ) AS "petitionerTechcenter", PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID AS PROCEEDINGSTATE, M.FILINGDT AS "filingDate", M.ACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "petAccordedFilingDate", M.NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "noticeOfAccordedFilingDate", M.PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT AS "prelimRespDate", M.INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT AS "instDecisionDate", M.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT AS "TERMINATIONDECISIONDT", M.HEARINGDT AS "hearingDate", SFTS.STATE_NM AS "status" FROM (SELECT P1.* FROM PROCEEDING P1 WHERE P1.PROCEEDING_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT FK_PROCEEDING_ID FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST WHERE END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND FK_PANELIST_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT APPLICATION_USER_ID FROM APPLICATION_USER WHERE CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL ) AND FK_PANELIST_ID = :userId ) ) P INNER JOIN PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PID.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PID.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 INNER JOIN PROCEEDING_FSM_INSTANCE PFI ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PFI.FK_PROCEEDING_ID INNER JOIN STND_FSM_TYPE_STATE SFTS ON PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID = SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PETITIONERNAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PETITIONERPARTY ON PETITIONERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PATENTOWNER FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PATENTOWNERPARTY ON PATENTOWNERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.PROCEEDINGID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 1, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 2, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS ACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 3, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 4, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 5, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 10, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS TERMINATIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 11, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS HEARINGDT FROM (SELECT M.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, M.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, M.MILESTONE_DT FROM PROCEEDING_MILESTONE M ) P GROUP BY P.PROCEEDINGID ) M ON M.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID WHERE SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID IN (1006,1013,1009,1003,1004,1008,1015,1021,1023,1002,1014) ORDER BY P.PROCEEDING_ID ) A WHERE A.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT IS NULL

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT P.PROCEEDING_ID AS "proceedingId", M.FILINGDT AS "filingDate", M.ACCORDEDFILINGDT AS "petAccordedFilingDate", M.NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT as "noticeAccordedDate", M.PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT as "preliminaryResDate", M.INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT AS "instDecisionDate", M.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT AS "TERMINATIONDECISIONDT" FROM (SELECT P1.* FROM PROCEEDING P1 WHERE P1.PROCEEDING_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT FK_PROCEEDING_ID FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST WHERE END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND FK_PANELIST_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT APPLICATION_USER_ID FROM APPLICATION_USER WHERE CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL ) ) ) P INNER JOIN PRCDNG_INVENTION_DISCLOSURE PID ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PID.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PID.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = 2 AND PID.APPLICATION_RANK_NO = 1 INNER JOIN PROCEEDING_FSM_INSTANCE PFI ON P.PROCEEDING_ID = PFI.FK_PROCEEDING_ID INNER JOIN STND_FSM_TYPE_STATE SFTS ON PFI.CFK_CURRENT_FSM_STATE_ID = SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PETITIONERNAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :petGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PETITIONERPARTY ON PETITIONERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, IP.LAST_NM || ', ' || IP.FIRST_NM AS PATENTOWNER FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, INDIVIDUAL_PARTY IP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :indvPartyTypeId AND IP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID, OP.ORGANIZATION_NM AS NAME FROM PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP PPG, PROCEEDING_PARTY PP, PARTY P, PROCEEDING PR, ORGANIZATION_PARTY OP WHERE PPG.PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_PARTY_GROUP_ID AND PP.RANK_NO = :rankNo AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_TYPE_ID = :poGroupTypeId AND PROCEEDING_ID = PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AND PP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND P.FK_PARTY_TYPE_ID = :orgPartyTypeId AND OP.FK_PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID AND PP.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_TYPE_CD = :prcdngPartyTypeCd AND PPG.FK_PRCDNG_PARTY_GROUP_STAT_ID IN (1) ) PATENTOWNERPARTY ON PATENTOWNERPARTY.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = P.PROCEEDING_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.PROCEEDINGID AS PROCEEDINGID, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 1, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS FILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 2, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS ACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 3, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS NOTICEACCORDEDFILINGDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 4, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS PRELIMINARYRESPONSEDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 5, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS INSTITUTIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 10, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS TERMINATIONDECISIONDT, MAX(DECODE(P.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, 11, P.MILESTONE_DT)) AS HEARINGDT FROM (SELECT M.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDINGID, M.FK_MILESTONE_TYPE_ID, M.MILESTONE_DT FROM PROCEEDING_MILESTONE M ) P GROUP BY P.PROCEEDINGID ) M ON M.PROCEEDINGID = P.PROCEEDING_ID WHERE SFTS.FSM_STATE_ID IN (1006,1013,1009,1003,1004,1008,1015,1021,1023,1002,1014) ORDER BY P.PROCEEDING_ID ) A WHERE A.TERMINATIONDECISIONDT IS NULL

SELECT LAST_NM as "lastName", FIRST_NM as "firstName" FROM (SELECT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDING_ID, AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID AS EMPLOYEEID, PP.PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID AS PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID, AU.LAST_NM AS LAST_NM, AU.FIRST_NM AS FIRST_NM FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST PP, APPLICATION_USER AU, STND_PANEL_ROLE SPR WHERE PP.END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL AND PP.FK_PANELIST_ID = AU.APPLICATION_USER_ID AND PP.FK_PANEL_ROLE_ID = SPR.PANEL_ROLE_ID AND PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID = :proceedingIdentifier ) ORDER BY PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID

SELECT DISTINCT PP.FK_PANELIST_ID AS "userIdentifier", AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID AS "employeeIdentifier" FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST PP, APPLICATION_USER AU WHERE PP.END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL AND PP.FK_PANELIST_ID = AU.APPLICATION_USER_ID

SELECT LAST_NM as "lastName", FIRST_NM as "firstName", PROCEEDING_ID as "proceedingIdentifier", EMPLOYEEID as "employeeIdentifier" FROM (SELECT PP.FK_PROCEEDING_ID AS PROCEEDING_ID, AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID AS EMPLOYEEID, PP.PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID AS PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID, AU.LAST_NM AS LAST_NM, AU.FIRST_NM AS FIRST_NM FROM PROCEEDING_PANELIST PP, APPLICATION_USER AU, STND_PANEL_ROLE SPR WHERE PP.END_EFFECTIVE_DT IS NULL AND AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID IS NOT NULL AND PP.FK_PANELIST_ID = AU.APPLICATION_USER_ID AND PP.FK_PANEL_ROLE_ID = SPR.PANEL_ROLE_ID AND AU.CFK_EMPLOYEE_ID = :employeeIdentifier ORDER BY PANELIST_SEQUENCE_ID )

SELECT sr.fk_report_type_nm AS "reportTypeName", sr.report_title_tx AS "reportTitle", sr.report_url_tx AS "reportURL", srt.display_folder_nm AS "displayName" FROM role_report rr, stnd_report sr, stnd_report_type srt, application_user_role aur WHERE rr.fk_user_role_id = aur.fk_user_role_id AND aur.fk_application_user_id = :appUserId AND sr.report_id = rr.fk_report_id AND srt.report_type_nm = sr.fk_report_type_nm ORDER BY sr.fk_report_type_nm, sr.report_title_tx ASC
